Column {.sidebar data-width=180}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

create_object <- function(value) {  
  list(object = value, created_at = Sys.time())  
}  

meu_objeto <- create_object(crypto_tbl) 

`r paste0("Last update: ", print(meu_objeto$created_at))`
